item.title: Israel-Gaza live updates: Hamas responds to Trump Gaza plan, calls for negotiations
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump hosted Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu at the White House on Monday, proposing a Gaza ceasefire agreement.

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs sentencing live updates: Combs gets 50 months in prison
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs will be sentenced on Friday after being found guilty of transportation to engage in prostitution.

item.title: WATCH: US kills 4 alleged narco-terrorists in strike off coast of Venezuela, Hegseth says
item.description: Secretary Pete Hegseth announced Friday that the U.S. ordered a strike on another alleged drug boat that left Venezuela.

item.title: Tyrese Gibson turns himself in, released on bond in Fulton County animal cruelty case
item.description: Tyrese Gibson turned himself in after being charged with animal cruelty and was released on bond.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
